sql:
SELECT
topics.id_topics,
topics.cateories_id,
topics.topic,
topics.question,
topics.creationUser,
topics.creationDate,
cateories.id_cateories, cateories.name, cateories.color,
user.id_user, user.login, user.displayName, user.image,
C.countReplies, LastUpdateDate,
suscriptions.id_suscriptions,
V.countView
FROM topics topics
join cateories on (topics.cateories_id = cateories.id_cateories)
join user on (topics.creationUser = user.id_user)

left join (
select topics_id, count(*) countReplies, max(LastUpdateDate) LastUpdateDate from replies
group by topics_id ) C on (C.topics_id = topics.id_topics)

left join (
select topics_id, count(*) countView from log_seen
group by topics_id ) V on (V.topics_id = topics.id_topics)

left join suscriptions on ( suscriptions.topics_id = topics.id_topics and suscriptions.user_id =  ':user.id_user')

order by topics.id_topics desc
name: topics
